{"step_by_step_thinking": "The adrenal gland in females secretes several hormones. However, from the given options, the hormone that is directly secreted by the adrenal gland is DHEA (Dehydroepiandrosterone). This is mentioned in Document [0], Document [1], and Document [24]. DHEA is an androgen and a precursor of both androgens and estrogens. It is then converted to more potent androgens such as testosterone or to estrogens in the gonads and other target organs.", "answer_choice": "D"}
